item.title: Example of projects
item.description: 5. Reuse # # Reuse ## Examples of projects Here are some examples of projects that use data from **data.gouv.nc**: - **OpenTransport NC**: a mobile app that uses transport data to provide real-time bus schedules. - **Cal√©doClimat**: an interactive dashboard that presents climate data for New Caledonia. Have you developed a project using our data? Submit it via the **Reuse** section to share it with the community.
